equal.val: Equal number of intake and exhaust fans
equal.desc: You have an equal number of intake and exhaust fans. This setup strikes a good balance between cooling and dust buildup. Cont...

moreIntake.val: More intake fans than exhaust fans
moreIntake.desc: You have more intake fans than exhaust fans. Cont...

moreExhaust.val: More exhaust fans than intake fans
moreExhaust.desc: You have more exhaust fans than intake fans. Cont...

good.desc: This setup ensures good airflow in your case and has little to no pockets of air buildup. Cont...
